title: KenIchi: The Mightiest Disciple
alternative_title: Shijou Saikyou no Deshi Kenichi, 史上最強の弟子 ケンイチ
description: Shirahama Ken'ichi is an average student who has earned the nickname "Weak Legs" from always getting bullied. One day he meets a cute girl named Fuurinji Miu who helps him build the courage to begin training at a mysterious dojo where she lives. Here Kenichi faces intense training from masters of many different martial arts styles as he attempts to become stronger.
genre: [<Genre -> Action>, <Genre -> Comedy>, <Genre -> Martial Arts>, <Genre -> School>, <Genre -> Shounen>]
